Name: Iron Torc
LongDescription: Prevents Pokémon from taking critical hits. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Aron, Lairon, and Aggron.  Finding an Iron Torc at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
